title: Fix empty USlideover content on users page
description:
## Problem The USlideover component on `/users` page opens but shows empty content when clicking a user row or "Details" menu item. ## Root Cause Content is in the default slot, but Nuxt UI v4's `USlideover` requires content in the `#body` slot. **Note**: Same file correctly uses `#body` for `UDashboardPanel` at line 155 - this was simply an oversight. ## Fix In `apps/web/src/pages/users.vue`: 1. Line 219: Wrap the existing `

title: Add user details slideover to users page
description:
Add a "Details" action to the dropdown menu on the users page that opens a USlideover with comprehensive user information.

## Context
Plan: /Users/ilyat/.claude/plans/breezy-questing-narwhal.md

Enhances apps/web/src/pages/users.vue with detailed user view.

## Implementation

### 1. State management (after line 14)
```ts
const selectedUser = ref<UserWithRole | null>(null)
const isDetailsOpen = computed({
  get: () => selectedUser.value !== null,
  set: (v) => { if (!v) selectedUser.value = null }
})
```

### 2. Update getUserActions (lines 62-87)
Add "Details" as first action group in both branches:
```ts
[{
  label: 'Details',
  icon: 'i-lucide-info',
  onSelect: () => { selectedUser.value = user },
}]
```

### 3. Add USlideover (after line 188)
Sections: Basic Info (id, email, name, role), Verification (emailVerified), Timestamps (createdAt, updatedAt), Ban Info (conditional: banReason, banExpires)

### 4. Update factory (apps/web/src/testing/factories/user-factory.ts)
Add: banReason: null, banExpires: null

### 5. Tests (apps/web/src/pages/users.test.ts)
8 tests for slideover functionality

## Acceptance Criteria
- Details in dropdown for active/banned users
- USlideover opens on click
- All info sections display correctly
- Ban info conditional
- Dates use toLocaleDateString()
- All tests pass

## References
- DB schema: apps/api/src/db/schemas/auth.ts:17-18
- users.vue, users.test.ts, user-factory.ts
